remarks: Rearrangement of 4 terms in a sum of ring elements.  (Contributed by Steve Rodriguez, 9-Sep-2007.)  (New usage is discouraged.)
statement:
ringgcl.1 $e |- G = ( 1st ` R ) $.
ringgcl.2 $e |- X = ran G $.
rngoa4 $p |- ( ( R e. RingOps /\ ( A e. X /\ B e. X ) /\ ( C e. X /\ D e. X ) ) -> ( ( A G B ) G ( C G D ) ) = ( ( A G C ) G ( B G D ) ) ) $.
